description: A script to quickly compute a SyN-based registration between two images using ANTS.

fixed_image.title: Fixed Image
fixed_image.description: Fixed image to which the moving image is registered.

moving_image.title: Moving Image
moving_image.description: Moving image that is registered to the fixed image.

transform_type.title: Transform Type
transform_type.description: Type of transform: 's' for SyN, 'b' for B-spline SyN. Default is 's'.
